channel.title: How do i make it so you can teloport in wild
channel.description:
Hello,
Im using the server base Pk Planet and i want to change the teloport stuff, so you can teloport when in wild cuz it sayin you can not teloport.. Sorry for bad english

item.title: How do i make it so you can teloport in wild
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

  1. Search for this

public void triggerTele(int x, int y, int height) {
2. Underneath it, delete this:

if(wildyLevel > 20 && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)){ sM("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness!"); return;
your new code should look like this:

public void triggerTele(int x, int y, int height) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > 5000) { lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); resetWalkingQueue(); }
change it to this:

public void triggerTele(int x, int y, int height) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > 5000) { lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); resetWalkingQueue(); } }

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it so you can teloport in wild
